pli-tv-pvr2.8:5.1: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:5.2: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:5.3: Adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:5.4: ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:5.6: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:6.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:6.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:6.9: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:6.11: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:6.14: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca … pe …. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.8:7.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:7.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:7.5: dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:8.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:8.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:8.11: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti na vācato na cittato, siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti na cittato, siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato, siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:8.15: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #2
